column2: [Dashboard][Sidebar Navigation]Verify that User can navigate to Dashboard successfully
column3: User navigation to main dashboard view
column4: 1. User is logged into system; 2. Dashboard module is accessible; 3. Sidebar navigation is visible
column5: 1. Locate Dashboard option in sidebar navigation; 2. Click on Dashboard menu item; 3. Wait for page navigation to complete; 4. Verify Dashboard page loads successfully; 5. Check Dashboard content displays correctly; 6. Confirm user is redirected to Dashboard view; 7. Validate Dashboard functionality is accessible
column6: 1. Dashboard option is visible and accessible in sidebar; 2. Click action triggers navigation process; 3. Page navigation completes without errors; 4. Dashboard page loads with expected content; 5. Dashboard content displays correctly with all elements; 6. User successfully redirected to Dashboard view; 7. Dashboard functionality is fully accessible and operational
column12: Login: qa-team-user; Environment: TMS Test Management

column2: [Dashboard][Filter Persistence]Verify that User can maintain Dashboard filters across module navigation
column3: Verify dashboard filter persistence when navigating between modules
column4: 1. User is logged into system; 2. Dashboard is accessible; 3. Filters can be configured; 4. Other modules are accessible
column5: 1. Navigate to Dashboard module; 2. Configure and set specific dashboard filters; 3. Navigate to another module (e.g. Job Master); 4. Perform actions in the other module; 5. Return to Dashboard module; 6. Check if previously set filters remain intact; 7. Verify filter persistence until browser refresh
column6: 1. Dashboard module loads successfully with filter options; 2. Filters are configured and applied correctly; 3. Navigation to other module completes successfully; 4. Other module functions normally; 5. Return to Dashboard completes successfully; 6. Previously configured filters remain intact and active; 7. Filter persistence confirmed until browser refresh
column12: Login: qa-team-user; Environment: TMS Test Management

column2: [Dashboard][Notification Section]Verify that User can view disabled Notification section correctly
column3: Verify notification section displays as disabled with no animation or redirection
column4: 1. User is logged into system; 2. Dashboard is accessible; 3. Notification section is visible; 4. User has appropriate permissions
column5: 1. Locate Notification section in sidebar or header; 2. Hover over Notification section to check for interactions; 3. Click on Notification section to test functionality; 4. Observe any animation or movement effects; 5. Check for any redirection or page changes; 6. Verify Notification section remains static; 7. Confirm disabled state is properly indicated
column6: 1. Notification section is visible and accessible in interface; 2. Hover action does not trigger any animations or effects; 3. Click action does not cause any navigation or redirection; 4. No animation or movement effects are observed; 5. No page changes or redirections occur; 6. Notification section remains completely static; 7. Disabled state is clearly indicated to user
column12: Login: qa-team-user; Environment: TMS Test Management

column2: [Dashboard][User Welcome Message]Verify that User can view welcome message and username correctly
column3: Verify welcome message displays with user's name in sidebar
column4: 1. User is logged into system; 2. Dashboard is accessible; 3. Sidebar is visible; 4. User profile information is available
column5: 1. Navigate to Dashboard module; 2. Locate sidebar bottom section; 3. Look for welcome message text; 4. Check for Welcome Back message with emoji; 5. Verify user's name is displayed below welcome message; 6. Confirm message formatting is correct; 7. Validate welcome message is properly positioned
column6: 1. Dashboard module loads successfully with sidebar visible; 2. Sidebar bottom section is accessible and visible; 3. Welcome message text is clearly displayed; 4. Welcome Back message with emoji is visible; 5. User's name is displayed correctly below welcome message; 6. Message formatting appears professional and readable; 7. Welcome message is properly positioned in sidebar bottom
column12: Login: qa-team-user; Environment: TMS Test Management

column2: [Dashboard][User Profile Dropdown]Verify that User can access profile dropdown via arrow click
column3: Verify profile dropdown opens with same options as profile icon click
column4: 1. User is logged into system; 2. Dashboard is accessible; 3. Username and arrow are visible; 4. Profile dropdown functionality is available
column5: 1. Locate username display in sidebar; 2. Identify arrow icon next to username; 3. Click on arrow icon next to username; 4. Wait for dropdown to appear; 5. Verify dropdown menu opens successfully; 6. Check dropdown contains expected options (Settings  Privacy  Logout); 7. Confirm dropdown matches profile icon functionality
column6: 1. Username display is visible and accessible in sidebar; 2. Arrow icon is clearly visible next to username; 3. Click action on arrow icon is responsive; 4. Dropdown appears without errors or delays; 5. Dropdown menu opens successfully with proper positioning; 6. Dropdown contains all expected options (Settings Privacy Logout); 7. Dropdown functionality matches profile icon dropdown exactly
column12: Login: qa-team-user; Environment: TMS Test Management

column2: [Dashboard][Profile Picture Display]Verify that User can view actual profile picture in sidebar
column3: Verify actual uploaded profile image displays instead of default icon
column4: 1. User is logged into system; 2. Dashboard is accessible; 3. Profile picture section is visible; 4. User has uploaded profile image
column5: 1. Navigate to Dashboard module; 2. Locate avatar/profile picture section in sidebar; 3. Look for profile picture display area; 4. Check if actual uploaded image is visible; 5. Verify image quality and dimensions are appropriate; 6. Confirm image is not default/placeholder icon; 7. Validate profile picture positioning and styling
column6: 1. Dashboard module loads successfully with sidebar visible; 2. Avatar/profile picture section is accessible and visible; 3. Profile picture display area is properly positioned; 4. Actual uploaded profile image is clearly visible; 5. Image quality and dimensions are appropriate for display; 6. Image is confirmed as actual uploaded photo  not default icon; 7. Profile picture is properly positioned and styled in sidebar
column12: Login: qa-team-user; Environment: TMS Test Management
